entries: The skum is permanently {@condition charmed} by its aboleth master.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The skum can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Psychic Conditioning
entries: The skum is immune to the {@condition frightened} condition and {@condition charmed} conditions unless they are from effects created by an aboleth.

trait.name: Water Dependency
entries: The skum takes 6 ({@damage 1d12}) acid damage every 10 minutes it goes without exposure to water.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) slashing damage plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) psychic damage.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The aboleth can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Acidic Mucous Cloud
entries: While underwater, the aboleth is surrounded by transformative mucus. A creature that touches the aboleth or that hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage and must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature is diseased for {@dice 1d4} hours. The diseased creature can breathe only underwater.

trait.name: Probing Telepathy
entries: If a creature communicates telepathically with the aboleth, the aboleth learns the creature's greatest desires if the aboleth can see the creature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The aboleth makes three tentacle attacks. Alternatively, it can use two slime orb attacks.

action.name: Slime Orb
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 11} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} until the end of the aboleth's next turn.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or become diseased. The disease has no effect for 1 minute and can be removed by any magic that cures disease. After 1 minute, the diseased creature's skin becomes translucent and slimy, the creature can't regain hit points unless it is underwater, and the disease can be removed only by {@spell heal} or another disease-curing spell of 6th level or higher. When the creature is outside a body of water, it takes 6 ({@damage 1d12}) acid damage every 10 minutes unless moisture is applied to the skin before 10 minutes have passed.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage.

action.name: Enslave (3/Day)
entries: The aboleth targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed} by the aboleth until the aboleth dies or until it is on a different plane of existence from the target. The {@condition charmed} target is under the aboleth's control and can't take reactions, and the aboleth and the target can communicate telepathically with each other over any distance.

Whenever the {@condition charmed} target takes damage, the target can repeat the saving throw. On a success, the effect ends. No more than once every 24 hours, the target can also repeat the saving throw when it is at least 1 mile away from the aboleth.

legendary.name: Tail Swipe
entries: The aboleth makes one tail attack.

legendary.name: Psychic Drain (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: One creature {@condition charmed} by the aboleth takes 17 ({@damage 5d6}) psychic damage, and the aboleth regains hit points equal to the damage the creature takes.

legendary.name: Slime Sphere (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The aboleth conjures a ball of acidic slime that explodes at a point it can see within 120 feet of it.

Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage and is {@condition restrained}, or half as much damage and isn't {@condition restrained} on a successful one. A {@condition restrained} creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the Aboleth's turns. A {@condition restrained} creature can use an action to perform a {@dc 16} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) or Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) check, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)

On a failure, the creature is diseased for {@dice 1d4} hours. The diseased creature can breathe only underwater.

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or become diseased. The disease has no effect for 1 minute and can be removed by any magic that cures disease. After 1 minute, the diseased creature's skin becomes translucent and slimy, the creature can't regain hit points unless it is underwater, and the disease can be removed only by {@spell heal} or another disease-curing spell of 6th level or higher. When the creature is outside a body of water, it takes 6 ({@damage 1d12}) acid damage every 10 minutes unless moisture is applied to the skin before 10 minutes have passed.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Enslave (3/Day)
entries: The aboleth targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed} by the aboleth until the aboleth dies or until it is on a different plane of existence from the target. The {@condition charmed} target is under the aboleth's control and can't take reactions, and the aboleth and the target can communicate telepathically with each other over any distance.

Whenever the {@condition charmed} target takes damage, the target can repeat the saving throw. On a success, the effect ends. No more than once every 24 hours, the target can also repeat the saving throw when it is at least 1 mile away from the aboleth.

action.name: Fling
entries: One Large or smaller object held or creature {@condition grappled} by the aboleth is thrown up to 60 feet and knocked {@condition prone}. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. If the aboleth uses multiattack, it can use its Fling in place of one of its tentacle attacks.

legendary.name: Enslave
entries: The aboleth uses its Enslave feature.

legendary.name: Tail Swipe
entries: The aboleth makes one tail attack.

legendary.name: Psychic Drain (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: One creature {@condition charmed} by the aboleth takes 28 ({@damage 8d6}) psychic damage, and the aboleth regains hit points equal to the damage the creature takes.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The aboleth casts a spell from its list of innate spells, using a spell slot as normal.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The aarakocra is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the aarakocra is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to the target.

trait.name: Fury of Syranita
entries: As a bonus action, the aarakocra can expend a spell slot to cause its melee or ranged weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 13 ({@damage 3d8}) lightning or thunder damage to a target on a hit. This beneft lasts until the end of the turn. If the aarakora expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each level above 1st (maximum {@dice 6d8}).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The aarakocra makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Talon
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the aarakocra is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to the target.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: The aarakocra has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The aarakocra makes two melee attacks: one with its javelin and one with its talon, or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Talon
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} pour toucher, portée de 5 ft. ou portée de 30/120 ft., une cible. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) dégâts perforants.

trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the aarakocra is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage to the target.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The aarakocra doesn't provoke an {@action opportunity attack} when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The aarakocra makes three melee attacks: one with its javelin and two with its talons, or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Talon
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} pour toucher, portée de 5 ft. ou portée de 30/120 ft., une cible. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) dégâts perforants.
